statements: ALTER TABLE car_details ADD COLUMN specification VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE car_details MODIFY COLUMN model VARCHAR(100);
ALTER TABLE car_details DROP COLUMN color;
ALTER TABLE vehicles ADD COLUMN color VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE owners ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE vehicles ALTER COLUMN year SET DEFAULT 2022;
ALTER TABLE Car ADD COLUMN color VARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE Manufacturer ADD COLUMN website VARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE Dealership ADD COLUMN phone_number VARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE Cars ADD COLUMN mileage INT
ALTER TABLE Owners ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE Services ADD COLUMN mechanic_name VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE car ADD COLUMN year INT
ALTER TABLE engine RENAME COLUMN type TO engine_type
ALTER TABLE tire ADD COLUMN price DECIMAL(10,2)
